title: Pathogen detection from (direct Nanopore) sequencing data using Galaxy - Foodborne Edition
questions: What are the steps to quality improve direct Nanopore datasets and prepare them for further analysis and investigations?
How to identify pathogens using sequencing data?
How to track the found pathogens through all your samples datasets?
objectives: Check samples' sequences quality reports generated by FastQC and NanoPlot for metagenomics Nanopore data
Pre-process the sequencing data by quality improving and host filtering
Perform taxonomy profiling indicating and visualizing up to species level in the samples
Identify pathogens based on the found virulance factor gene products via assembly, identify strains and indicate all antimicrobial resistance genes in samples
Identify pathogens via SNP calling and build the consensus gemone of the samples
Relate all samples' pathogenic genes for tracking pathogens via phylogenetic trees and heatmaps
